description:
One Sunday, Kazuho asks Renge to help her plant some saplings in the garden. Renge is excited and calls the other students from the branch school to help. When Kazuho teases Renge by telling her the saplings they`re planting are bell peppers, Renge tries to get out of helping, but Kazuho brings her back by admitting it was a joke. Natsumi and Komari confess that they aren`t fans of bell peppers either, but Hotaru says she doesn`t mind them, leaving the others marveling over how mature she is...
Source: crunchyroll
